statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_history SET wallet_address = '0x1234567890' , currency = 'USD' WHERE amount > 500.00;
UPDATE transaction_history SET timestamp = '2022-03-15 15:30:00', amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_history SET currency = 'USD', wallet_address = '0xAbCDeF012345' WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-15' AND amount > 500.00;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 25.67, transaction_type = 'Buy' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET last_accessed = '2022-01-15 09:30:00', owner_name = 'Alice' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 10.5, transaction_type = 'Buy' WHERE id = 100
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET last_accessed = '2022-09-30 10:15:00', owner_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 200
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500.00, timestamp = '2022-05-30 10:15:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET balance = 1000.50, user_id = 555 WHERE address_id = 67890
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = amount + 100, currency = 'USD' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET balance = balance - 50.25 WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 25.678 WHERE transaction_id = 123
UPDATE market_prices SET price = 1345.6789, price_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE coin_symbol = 'BTC'
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 10.50, from_wallet_address = 'abc123', to_wallet_address = 'xyz789' WHERE transaction_id = 1000;
UPDATE market_prices SET price = 5000.1234, price_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE coin_symbol = 'BTC';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1500.75, currency = 'USD' WHERE id = 123456;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET owner = 'John Doe', account_balance = 2500.50 WHERE address = '0x2b0c9f03a2e5c657f3c601563425c1e8a3c6221f';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1000.50, date = '2022-01-10' WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE wallet_addresses SET account_balance = 5000.75 WHERE address = '0x1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J';
